docs.title: Mission
docs.text: NPAC is an interdisciplinary core sponsoring software infrastructure, development, and education for human brain imaging. Our focus is on open and accessible tools for reproducible pipelines.

docs.title: About
docs.text:
We are part of the MR Research Center at University of Pittsburgh.

NPAC is a young initiative and is excited to meet community needs. Please reach out to Will Foran for anything you cannot find on the sidebar or in our current projects or our github.

docs.title: Data-Ops
docs.text:
Common conventions

  • YODA
  • Version control (git, fossil, pijul)
    • atomic
    • conventional commits (vs. gitmoji)
    • pre-commit hooks
      • lint/fmt
      • test
  • Container-ize (docker/podman/singularity, nix/guix)
  • Provenance tracking
  • Automate
